genome_file.description: Raw genome file submitted by user for annotation

genome_file_reference_ids_altered.description: Altered genome file with substituted reference IDSs

original_reference_id_mapping_to_finder_.description: Tab delimited file containing the mapping between original reference IDs and finder introduced reference IDs.

regions_of_low_short_read_coverage_conso.description: File contains the loci where no RNA-Seq short read sample has sufficient reads. Tab delimited 3 columns -> chromosome, start, end
